title: Cricket Cage, ca. 1903
inscribed: Written on underside in pencil: "Florence, Italy / April 1903  / Cricket cage for Ascension Day"
provenance: From the collection of Alexander Wilson Drake.
dimensions: H x W x D (handle extended vertically): 12.4 x 8 x 6 cm (4 7/8 x 3 1/8 x 2 3/8 in.)
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Upright rectangular cage with peaked roof having loop handle at top, zigzag wire along front and side edges; swinging door on spring; red-painted wood base with four circular wire feet.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cricket Cage, ca. 1903.
ca. 1903. Metal wire, stained wood. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1916-40-7.
